About Scout Digital Training

Scout Digital Training is a specialist division of Scout Digital Marketing, dedicated to providing practical and effective digital training to small groups.

About the trainer

The Google Analytics and SEO training courses are facilitated by Erica Stacey (nee Nistico), Top Scout and Digital Marketer at Scout Digital Marketing.

Erica has been working in digital for nearly 10 years, and is obsessed with understanding and using data to improve online results.

She is passionate about helping webmasters understand how to best manage their own website content, optimising it for visitors and search engines, and interpreting their metrics to improve performance.

Google has recognised Erica as a Google Analytics and AdWords certified professional, meaning that she has passed multiple exams that assess her product expertise.

Testimonial

Erica provided an in depth consultation to help me improve my SEO.

Her knowledge and skills exceeded my expectations.

Her friendly and non patronising manner really helped me learn an incredible amount in a short amount of time.

Not only that but her advice was so clear and actionable that I started to see results in a few days!

I cannot recommend Erica highly enough for SEO and digital strategy and services.

Vanessa Jones
Copywriter + content writer + social media marketer
Jones the Writer.

The training venue

All of these half day courses are held in a dedicated computer training room, conveniently located in the Adelaide CBD.

The IVC (International Visualisation Centre)
19 Young Street
Adelaide, South Australia

Car parking

The IVC is surrounded by carparking options. Undercover car parks or public transport are recommended for the half day training courses, as on-street car parks are limited to 1-2 hours).

Food and drinks (i.e. coffee coffee coffee)

A tea and coffee station, water, biscuits and some fruit are provided during the training session.

The IVC is conveniently surrounded by a number of cafes and restaurants for any other food and drinks, before or after the training session.

Courses:

Introduction to Google Analytics

Taking Google Analytics Further

Introduction to SEO Best Practices
